title: How can we use temperature sensors in agriculture? - Quora

response.answer_text: In agriculture, temperature sensors can be used to get visibility of the goods getting transported via road, rail and sea. You can keep track of unauthorized stops and route deviations with which you can react promptly to normalize conditions or isolating spoilt goods. Most Important is Agri-Equipment Identify your aging equipment promptlyImprove the utilization of farm and factory equipmentReduce the risk of loss or theft
